comment:
LED fixture:A type of lighting fixture that uses Light Emitting Diodes (LEDs) as the source of light. LED lights are known for their energy efficiency and long lifespan.
fluorescence lamp:A type of lighting fixture that uses fluorescence to produce light. Fluorescent lamps are commonly used in commercial and residential settings.
units of electricity per hour:The amount of electrical energy consumed by a light fixture in one hour. It is typically measured in kilowatt-hours (kWh) or simply units.
